pages.text:
[Page Title: Home - Joey Tomatoes]

Welcome to Joey Tomatoes!
“How You Doin?” 
The Best in the Business

Mount Pleasant’s first authentic Italian Deli & Market. Created by the owners of Bricco Bracco who love keeping a little bit of Jersey Italian with us here in the Low Country.

Come in early, grab a seat, and enjoy one of our hearty breakfast, lunch, dinner or weekend brunch offerings.All featuring homemade fresh soups, salads, authentic Italian deli sandwiches!

Don’t have time to cook…pick up one of our “Grab N Go” prepared meals.Made fresh Daily!

No time to dine in?

No problem!
J.T.’s Market offers a wide variety of fresh, homemade, “Grab and Go”, soups, salads, pasta, and good ole’ Jersey sandwiches as well as a daily selection of fresh cakes and Italian pastries to round out your meal. The Deli at Chuck Dawley The Market at Clements Ferry 
From Our Family to Yours
We know you will fall in love with Joey Tomatoes, Ciao Mt. Pleasant! 
The Deli

1034 Chuck Dawley Blvd Mt. Pleasant, SC 29464
(843) 352-2294 MON – FRI 10:30am-6:00pm SAT 
9:00am-5:00pm

SUN

9:00am-3:00pm

The Market

1190A Clements Ferry Road Cainhoy, SC 29492
(843) 867-6044 MON – FRI 11:00am-6:00pm SAT 
9:00am-5:00pm
